page.title: 01Living in Coatham
page.content:
My name is Sean Murphy. I live in a terraced house on Coatham Road. In our family there is my Mam and Dad. I also have one brother and two sisters. My Dad works for British Telecom and my Mam works at an Italian restaurant called "Nino on the Sea".
Living in Coatham is very nice because it is near the beach and sand dunes. At Coatham there is a place called the Beck and in the summer I go to catch stickle-backs. Sometimes we see water rats.
The school that I go to is called Coatham C.E. Primary School. It is very good because it has a field. In the class room there is a wet area with a sink. The church in Coatham is very nice but there has been a lot of vandalism to the grave stones.
